Skarżyn  () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Biała Piska, within Pisz County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  east of Biała Piska,  east of Pisz, and  east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
The village has a population of 190.
